Inside, each property offers complete open plan living, with super modern kitchens and bathrooms, spacious living areas, top quality finishes throughout, with internal features such as smart phone controlled heating systems/lighting and window blinds, with many other bespoke options available. Community areas offer beautiful manicured gardens, a large swimming pool with large chill out beds and sea views, a children's play area, a state of the art gymnasium, and a private social club. The community will also have charging sockets for electric vehicles, and an energy saving system via aerothermia. Each property is also sold with a large private parking space and storage room.  Construction due to start in February 2020, with an 18 month construction period. Build sizes from 107.66m2 to 183.75m2. Bedrooms 2 to 4. Bathrooms 2 to 3. Prices from €293,000 to €722,000 (2 beds from €293,000, 3 beds from €361,000, 4 beds from €491,000).
